name: Teahouse Stove: Slow Steaming
description: This furnishing setup comprised of tea baskets and stoves and can be found in Chunming Teaworks, to be used for roasting and drying tea leaves. The three stoves have different temperatures to accommodate the processing needs of various tea types. Skilled tea artisans select the most suitable one based on the tea leaves' specific characteristics.\nTea processing requires meticulousness, brooking no negligence, for even the slightest flaw can affect the tea's final flavor..\nNaturally, this principle applies not only to tea processing but to almost any job, with success closely tied to one's attention to detail.
